scripts.build: npm run build-python && npm run build-cdk
scripts.build-python: npm run clean-build && pipenv lock --requirements >> app/requirements/base.txt && cp -r app build && pip3 install -r app/requirements/base.txt -t build
scripts.build-cdk: npm run clean-cdk && npm run cdk-synth
scripts.clean: npm run clean-tests && npm run clean-build && npm run clean-cdk
scripts.clean-tests: find . -path '*/__pycache__/*' -delete && find . -type d  -name '__pycache__' -delete && find . -type d  -path '*/.pytest_cache/*' -exec rm -r {} + && find . -name '.coverage' -delete && rm test/cdk.test.js test/cdk.test.d.ts
scripts.run-lambda-local: pipenv run python-lambda-local -f lambda_handler app/src/calculate/full_amount/app.py event.json
